item.description: This will be our second meet up group! We will have the meet up rain or shine since we have lots of indoor and outdoor space available. If the weather is nice, I can set up some kiddy pools for the dogs to play in. We also have a jungle gym and a tunnel. Last meet up group was a blast! If you have any questions regarding the meet up group, please do not hesitate to email me. I hope to see lots of new faces!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask an associate at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Small Dog Social Hour!
